mapper.select: SELECT Q.NO , Q.WRITER_NO , M.NICK , Q.TITLE , Q.CONTENT , Q.CREATED_DATE , Q.SECRET_YN , Q.ADMIN_NO , A.NICK AS ADMIN_NICK , Q.ANSWER_TITLE , Q.ANSWER_CONTENT , Q.ANSWER_DATE , Q.DEL_DATE FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = Q.WRITER_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER A ON M.NO = Q.ADMIN_NO ORDER BY NO

SELECT Q.NO , Q.WRITER_NO , M.NICK , Q.TITLE , Q.CONTENT , Q.CREATED_DATE , Q.SECRET_YN , Q.ADMIN_NO , A.NICK AS ADMIN_NICK , Q.ANSWER_TITLE , Q.ANSWER_CONTENT , Q.ANSWER_DATE , Q.DEL_DATE FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = Q.WRITER_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER A ON M.NO = Q.ADMIN_NO WHERE Q.NO = #{no}

SELECT Q.NO , Q.WRITER_NO , M.NICK , Q.TITLE , Q.CONTENT , Q.CREATED_DATE , Q.SECRET_YN , Q.ADMIN_NO , A.NICK AS ADMIN_NICK , Q.ANSWER_TITLE , Q.ANSWER_CONTENT , Q.ANSWER_DATE , Q.DEL_DATE FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = Q.WRITER_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER A ON M.NO = Q.ADMIN_NO WHERE TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR CONTENT LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
ORDER BY TITLE
ORDER BY CONTENT
